title: bigmanik
author: bigmanik
content: Hopefully, I will be the first to say this, but congratulations to all Bitcoiners who were able to hold on for this long It obviously wasn't easy as it required discipline and dedication But we are hereAnd I'm so happyAs Bitcoin has now hit a 100k margin It feels so unrealI'm so excited DamnI think we should have a word wide party ðŸ˜‚We will be back againWhen it hits 500k

comments.author: cr1776
comments.body: Patience is a virtue. ðŸ˜€Quote from: bigmanik on December 05, 2024, 02:45:02 AMHopefully, I will be the first to say this, but congratulations to all Bitcoiners who were able to hold on for this long It obviously wasn't easy as it required discipline and dedication But we are hereAnd I'm so happyAs Bitcoin has now hit a 100k margin It feels so unrealI'm so excited DamnI think we should have a word wide party ðŸ˜‚We will be back againWhen it hits 500k

comments.author: bigmanik
comments.body: The time is finally here"Everyone, grab a bottle of your country's favorite drink! Drinks are on me!"ðŸ˜…ðŸ˜…Pardon me I'm just so excited ðŸ˜…ðŸ˜…

comments.author: Patikno
comments.body: I believe Bitcoin can reach $100,000 in the near future, but I don't think it will still happen this year. Congrats to all Bitcoin holders, especially old holders who have the confidence & resilience to continue holding Bitcoin even though there's a lot of bad news that always comes to haunt their beliefs. Here we are now, at our new milestone. I'm sure, next year we will be at least at $150,000 #WAGMI.

comments.author: dbshck
comments.body: Congrats to everyone who believed in Bitcoin!Powellâ€™s recent remark comparing Bitcoin to gold seems to have been a catalyst in pushing Bitcoin past the $100k mark. Next up: flipping goldâ€™s market cap.

comments.author: headingnorth
comments.body: Just woke up, turned on the PC to check my personal messages and happened to catch the price at $103K. Almost couldn't believe it.Congrats to all, and thank you President Trump!

comments.author: reagansimms
comments.body: The party has just begun, there are still other surprises that Bitcoin has given to all investors who have entrusted their funds to be stored in this most popular asset. After this, there will be a price spike that exceeds the figure that has just been achieved, my assumption is that the influx of funds into Bitcoin-based ETF products is the main trigger for the strong flow that pushes the price of Bitcoin to a higher level. I still have great confidence in the huge potential that Bitcoin can generate in the coming year, its price could strengthen significantly and exceed other psychological thresholds for investors. I think what investors have been hoping for will soon come true because current market conditions are heading in a better direction, if Bitcoin adoption becomes more widespread next year, then the dream will soon come true because it will further encourage its acceptance in the global market.

comments.author: Shishir99
comments.body: Op. I understand your excitement. I was too excited as well when I saw the price of Bitcoin this morning. I cannot tell you how happy I was. I was just scrolling my mobile screen and smiling seeing how it's pumping. Yeah, Congratulations to the Bitcoin holders. They actually getting the reward for the faith they put in Bitcoin and are able to hold Bitcoin it so far.Once again, I want to say that Bitcoin has a lot of potential and we may see 1 Million dollars one day. But for now, enjoy the current market and never sell your entire Bitcoin holding.

comments.author: Pandorak
comments.body: The long-awaited time has come, and it took a long time i guess, and was totally worth it. Congratulations to all of us for this rise in bitcoin, and obviously this is due to the impact of trump and his support for bitcoin. I believe this is really the fulcrum for the glory of bitcoin, and it has already begun.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: I have said this a couple of times already, this is a very exciting time for all bitcoiners, and i have this feeling that we are just getting started and there is a lot more to be excited about next year and in the future. Congratulations to all bitcoiners, i know there is more to bitcoin than just the price, but it is great for BTC price to be above $100k, it shows we made the right choice sticking around.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: dbshck on December 05, 2024, 03:02:25 AMCongrats to everyone who believed in Bitcoin!Powellâ€™s recent remark comparing Bitcoin to gold seems to have been a catalyst in pushing Bitcoin past the $100k mark. Next up: flipping goldâ€™s market cap.Bitcoin can easily get 4th if it reaches $125k. Maybe even just $120k, but I didn't do the math.Second place should be achievable after $250k.To finally topple gold, you'd need to somehow multiply that price by 6, so $1.25m at least. Even $1m won't be enough.None of that looks like it's going to happen any time soon though.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: bigmanik on December 05, 2024, 02:45:02 AMHopefully, I will be the first to say this, but congratulations to all Bitcoiners who were able to hold on for this long It obviously wasn't easy as it required discipline and dedication But we are hereAnd I'm so happyAs Bitcoin has now hit a 100k margin It feels so unrealI'm so excited DamnI think we should have a word wide party ðŸ˜‚We will be back againWhen it hits 500kDefinitely, a worldwide party is the way to go, it's an incredible moment for all bitcoin holders, this moment is so special not because we never believed bitcoin could reach this amount, I mean, I particularly never doubted the fact that bitcoin will reach $100k someday, but then, I am more happy because neysayers have been put to shame, alot of people, specially the ones at that top whom we consider as financial advisor, have all in previous times advised against investing in bitcoin, I remember one Peter (somebody) saying that Bitcoin will go back to zero in one of his tweets, on another tweet, he said that Bitcoin will never reach a hundred thousand dollars..But today, it happened and the whole world can see, this is definitely the beginning of an incredible journey, I feel like $1m is not so far away, keep buying and hodling, and let's keep winning with Bitcoin.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: Z-tight on December 05, 2024, 01:02:06 PMI have said this a couple of times already, this is a very exciting time for all bitcoiners, and i have this feeling that we are just getting started and there is a lot more to be excited about next year and in the future. Congratulations to all bitcoiners, i know there is more to bitcoin than just the price, but it is great for BTC price to be above $100k, it shows we made the right choice sticking around.Yesterday the price was above $94,000 when I checked and I predicted that it might drop slightly today. I caught a bus going to work and decided to check some messages on a social media platform, this was when I saw the news in some people's status. I never knew it will get to the $100,000 too sudden, its just surprising. Many reasons have been given for this rise but I don't care about it. I am more concerned about how Bitcoin has silenced many critics who have predicted the death of Bitcoin. A big congratulations to everyone who believed in Bitcoin even in the face of opposition and FUD.

comments.author: goldkingcoiner
comments.body: I think the next point to celebrate is 1 million. Might take a few years or might happen suddenly. Who knows? All I know is that I will be hodling forever. Fuck Dollars, fuck Euros, fuck Rubels and fuck the the government for using banks as a tool to enforce financial fascism. We are our own banks.

comments.author: mirakal
comments.body: This is what I mean when I say the holiday season can significantly shake up market trends. Iâ€™ll admit, I didnâ€™t expect bitcoin to hit $100k this early in Decemberâ€”but here we are. Itâ€™s something we canâ€™t control, and it was bound to happen. This marks another major milestone in bitcoinâ€™s history, and a lot of people, especially late investors, are thrilled to still have a chance to profit.But the big question isâ€”are there still people willing to buy bitcoin at this point? For me, itâ€™s tough to expect itâ€™ll rise further to $120k for them to make even more profit if they buy these days.Iâ€™m really happy with the current situation and can only hope the drop, when it happens, wonâ€™t be too fast.

comments.author: Ishicryptic
comments.body: A big congratulations to everybody that have believed that Bitcoin will hit $100k in this year, months back before the US election, it seemed like there wasn't going to be a correction, many people thought that $100k might not be possible this year but here we are now. Bitcoin has proven beyond reasonable doubts that it is a valuable asset and will continue to reach new ATH in the future. I wasn't too surprised to see the $100k price, infact I had been expecting it to happen anytime soon because it was always nearing it, I'm happy and relieved that it has made the mark and slightly surpassed it, what I am looking forward to is seeing $150k before bear run.

comments.author: CoinFoxs
comments.body: Yes after waiting so long we finally see Bitcoin crossing the 6-digit milestone, A big congrats to all the holders, investors, and users of Bitcoin. This is just a beginning many more to come. Keep buying bitcoins!

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: $100K is a big remark, as we can see there are many OGs went active in this forum today, before that they're sleeping in caves.Congratulations guys, I have sold my coins at $100K and convert it to altcoins, then I'm looking to buy Bitcoin again when the price down. Quote from: Ishicryptic on December 05, 2024, 02:25:32 PMA big congratulations to everybody that have believed that Bitcoin will hit $100k in this year, months back before the US election, it seemed like there wasn't going to be a correction, many people thought that $100k might not be possible this year but here we are now.No one expect Powell will say Bitcoin is like gold though, you know he mostly talk about macro economic, stock and gold, not Bitcoin.Quote from: NotATether on December 05, 2024, 01:16:44 PMBitcoin can easily get 4th if it reaches $125k. Maybe even just $120k, but I didn't do the math.It's still possible to get 4th rank, another $25K isn't that big.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: bigmanik on December 05, 2024, 02:45:02 AMWe will be back againWhen it hits 500kThis reminds me of a few years ago when I heard some people saying that within 10 years the price of bitcoin will reach $500,000. To be honest, I laughed a lot at that, but now looking at the price I'm starting to think that it's not impossible to happen. But I wonder how many years it would take for the price to reach $500,000. Maybe we'll need another 10 years. I think it will all depend on how the Trump administration will deal with bitcoin. If he can have a pro-bitcoin administration that creates good laws about bitcoin, it could increase the adoption of cryptocurrencies around the world because many countries tend to copy things that the US does.

comments.author: MusaMohamed
comments.body: Quote from: Slow death on December 05, 2024, 03:28:17 PMThis reminds me of a few years ago when I heard some people saying that within 10 years the price of bitcoin will reach $500,000. To be honest, I laughed a lot at that, but now looking at the price I'm starting to think that it's not impossible to happen. But I wonder how many years it would take for the price to reach $500,000. Maybe we'll need another 10 years. I think it will all depend on how the Trump administration will deal with bitcoin. If he can have a pro-bitcoin administration that creates good laws about bitcoin, it could increase the adoption of cryptocurrencies around the world because many countries tend to copy things that the US does.To hit $500,000, it won't be all come from Trump administration because it will some more market cycles. How many more market cycles needed, I don't know. If Bitcoin makes its ATH in this cycle like $150,000 or $200,000, it's possible that $500,000 will be possible in next 2 or 3 more market cycles. 8 or 12 more years, is long in waiting time but time flies fast and soon we will come to 2028, 2032 and 2035 years very quickly.Trump adminstration will be only one of bricks that contribute to success of Bitcoin, but it won't be a single factor for Bitcoin success and why it hits $500,000.
